Class Holdem

java.lang.Object
CardGame
Holdem
public class Holdem extends CardGame
Class representing the game texas holdem. It inherits the abstract game class

  • Constructor Details

    • Holdem

      public Holdem(Player[] playerList, int highBet)
      Constructor for a round of texas holdem
      Parameters:
      playerList - // List of players in the game. Will always be 4 including the dealer for our purposes
      highBet - // Stores initial big blind for the first round of betting

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Function called to setup a round of holdem Adds all players to the list of active players (People who haven't folded) Sets up initial bet values for the blinds
      Specified by:
      setup in class CardGame

    • resetPlayerResponses

      public void resetPlayerResponses(HoldemPlayer currentPlayer, int pTurn)
      Resets responses for all players EXCEPT the current player Used to allow all players to respond to change in the bet / raise
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - Current player in loop
      pTurn - Index of current player in playerList
